t: In Hebrew texts 6:1-15 is numbered 5:27-41, and 6:16-81 is numbered 6:1-66.
6:14*r Hebrew Jehozadak*i , a variant of Jozadak*i ; also in verse 15
6:16*r Hebrew Gershom,*i a variant of Gershon*i ; also in verses 17, 20, 43, 62 and 71
6:26*r Some Hebrew manuscripts, Septuagint and Syriac; most Hebrew manuscripts Ahimoth*i and*i Elkanah.*i The*i sons*i of*i Elkanah:*i
6:27*r Some Septuagint manuscripts (see also 1 Samuel 1:19,20 and 1 Chron. 6:33,34); Hebrew does not have and*i Samuel*i his*i son*i .*i
6:28*r Some Septuagint manuscripts and Syriac (see also 1 Samuel 8:2 and 1 Chron. 6:33); Hebrew does not have Joel*i .*i
In Hebrew texts 6:1-15 is numbered 5:27-41, and 6:16-81 is numbered 6:1-66.
6:40*r Most Hebrew manuscripts; some Hebrew manuscripts, one Septuagint manuscript and Syriac Maaseiah*i
6:57*r See Joshua 21:13; Hebrew given*i the*i cities*i of*i refuge:*i Hebron,*i Libnah.*i
6:59*r Syriac (see also Septuagint and Joshua 21:16); Hebrew does not have Juttah*i .*i
6:60*r See Joshua 21:17; Hebrew does not have Gibeon*i .*i
6:67*r See Joshua 21:21; Hebrew given*i the*i cities*i of*i refuge:*i Shechem,*i Gezer.*i
6:77*r See Septuagint and Joshua 21:34; Hebrew does not have Jokneam,*i Kartah*i .*i
